H0.text: What socially responsible brand was added to Cadbury's Dairy Milk Chocolate in July 2009. Rainforest Alliance

H1.text: What socially responsible brand was added to Cadbury's Dairy Milk Chocolate in July 2009. Organic Farmers Association

H2.text: What socially responsible brand was added to Cadbury's Dairy Milk Chocolate in July 2009. UTZ Certified

H3.text: What socially responsible brand was added to Cadbury's Dairy Milk Chocolate in July 2009. Fairtrade

A4.text: Cadbury stated it would source cocoa beans through Fair Trade channels.
